examples: He went to a far land.

definitions.definition: Long. (Can we add an example for this sense?)

examples: See those two mountains? The ogre lives on the far one.
He moved to the far end of the state. She remained at this end.

definitions.definition: Extreme, as measured from some central or neutral position.
examples: They are on the far right on this issue.

definitions.definition: Extreme , as a difference in nature or quality.
Outside the currently selected segment in a segmented memory architecture .
examples: far heap; far memory; far pointer

( programming , not comparable ) Outside the currently selected segment in a segmented memory architecture .
